A leader in ATM cash replenishment, cash collections and processing, security storage and time critical courier. One of the main areas of expertise in the overall success of Guardforce is specialized security transport services. When valuables need to be conveyed from one location to another, Guardforce has the technology, manpower and experience to get the job done right every time. For more details, please call us at 2765-2832. Our Sales & Marketing professionals would be pleased to discuss your needs and provide solutions that will add value to your business. Collection & Delivery Service ATM Management Service Wrapped Coins Supply & Coin Processing Service Security Storage Service Cash Processing Service Pick and Pack Service Sub-Treasury Services International Service Collection & Delivery Service Guardforce can provide highly reliable and secure cash and valuable collection and delivery services to reduce your risk in handling the transportation of cash and valuables. We are able to delivery this quality through the largest armoured fleet in Hong Kong that is equipped with the latest technology, professionally trained security personnel backed by full insurance coverage. ATM Management Service Guardforce provides comprehensive ATM management services, from cash replenishing, deposit envelope processing, cash depositor monitoring to attending alarm response and emergency maintenance service for machine failure. Our highly trained staff and complete ATM service can help you to develop your ATM networks without worrying about logistical problems. Wrapped Coins Supply & Coin Processing Service Exchanging and counting coins is a time consuming process that interferes with the core focus of your business. If you want to improve your company's efficiency, The Guardforce complete coin service can definitely help you. We supply all denominations of coins to meet your daily exchange need. Guardforce also has hi-tech equipment to count and verify high volume of coins. This service is particularly suitable to those business receiving coins on regular basis. Security Storage Service Guardforce's secure storage service offers you peace of mind. Our strongroom is manned 24-hours and 365-days offering over 1500 sq. feet of high security storage that includes advanced electronic access control, sophisticated alarm monitoring and recording system and color digital CCTV monitoring. Our high security storage area is up to Bank Vault standards and offers excellent short or long term secure storage. Cash Processing Service Guardforce provides a solution for handling bulk cash that will reduce your costs of processing cash in your business. Our Cash Processing Centre is in a high security area installed with real-time video recording systems and access control systems. Cash collected from your outlets are sorted, verified and consolidated into one single deposit in this Centre and them promptly deposited into your bank account. Customized management reports will be produced that will meet the requirements of your accounting department. Pick and Pack Service The pick and pack service offers you a total solution to address your need in handling phone cards, gift certificates, cash coupons and other stored value cards. The service includes the collection, packing, storage and distribution as well as inventory management. Sub-Treasury Services The sub treasury service focuses on the outsourcing need of the bank for their treasury function. The service includes the cash forecasting, cash collecting and processing and the supply of the emergency cash.

Offering a professional complete security management solution . Since 1977, Guardforce Security Personnel has grown into one of the market leaders with a highly diverse guarding operation in Hong Kong. We assemble security personnel into teams that are tailor-made to complement your integrated security plan. Teams of uniformed security personnel predominantly serve in an overt, professional and disciplined manner for a wide range of commercial, retail, residential, financial, industrial customers. Plain-clothes personnel are deployed when customers require a more discreet, customer services focus to their security solution.
